events.message: The customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on May 11, 2024, involving their car rear-ended by another driver at a traffic light.
The claim was reviewed by the intake team and categorised under 'Auto Accident' due to the nature of the vehicle collision and damages described.
An experienced claims agent was assigned promptly to the case to ensure timely follow-up and client support following the reported auto accident.
Acknowledgement email was sent to the customer confirming receipt of the auto accident claim and outlining the next steps in the claims process.
The agent requested photographs of the damaged vehicle, police report, and repair estimates to proceed with the investigation of the auto accident claim.
Customer submitted all requested documents including detailed images of the vehicle damage and an official police report regarding the collision.
The claims investigation team began reviewing submitted evidence and contacted repair shops for additional damage assessments on the vehicle.
Investigation completed with a confirmation that the damages align with the reported auto accident circumstances and claim is eligible for settlement.
A settlement offer covering full repair costs and rental car expenses was proposed to the customer based on the findings from the claim investigation.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the settlement offer and the responsiveness of the claims team throughout the auto accident claim process.
The claim was officially approved for payment after the customer accepted the proposed settlement terms related to their auto accident damages.
The approved payment for vehicle repairs and incurred rental car costs was processed and issued to the customerâ€™s designated bank account.
The auto accident claim file was formally closed after confirming payment receipt and resolving all customer inquiries related to the case.
The documentation for the auto accident claim was archived securely in accordance with regulatory requirements and company policy.
